message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement section, I can see a specific line item:

```
Cash and Cash Equivalents
Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-01
```

This clearly indicates the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

Alternatively, I can also verify this by looking at the balance sheet. The initial amounts (as of 2023-12-31) for cash-related accounts are:
- Cash on Hand: 3000000.00
- Bank Deposits: 5000000.00
Which totals 8000000.00

Both approaches confirm that the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period was 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
